attributes.action: halt the planned increase in fuel duty in the Budget and look to start reducing overall fuel duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the average cost of a litre of petrol rises towards £1.20, we the undersigned call on the Prime Minister and the Chancellor of the Exchequer to reconsider and halt the planned rise in fuel duty in the 2010 budget and call on them to start reducing duty to help hard pressed, hardworking, taxpayers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
